grades.name: SE
grades.disclaimer: Standard Features • 16" Alloy wheels • Manual air-conditioning • Front and rear electric windows • Cruise control • Mazda Multimedia System featuring app integrations for internet connectivity • Smart City Brake Support

grades.name: SE Nav
grades.disclaimer: Standard Features as SE model plus: • Integrated navigation with 3-years free European map updates

grades.name: SE-L
grades.disclaimer: Standard Features as SE model plus: • Bi-Xenon headlights and LED daytime running lights • Dual-zone climate control air-conditioning • Rear parking sensors • Auto lights and wipers

grades.name: SE-L Nav
grades.disclaimer: Standard Features as SE-L model plus: • Integrated navigation with 3-years free European map updates

grades.name: Sport Nav
grades.disclaimer: Standard Features as SE-L model plus: • 18" Alloy wheels • Adaptive Front lighting System • Front and rear parking sensors • Active Driving Display (Head-up display) • Bose surround-sound audio system

grades.name: 165ps Sport Nav
grades.disclaimer: Standard Features as Sport Nav model plus: • Black leather interior • Power adjustable driver's seat • i-ELOOP regenerative braking system • Active air shutter

standardFeatures.name: Front and rear electric windows, with one-touch auto down/up for driver's window
Cruise control with manual speed adjustment
Integrated Bluetooth®: Audio hands-free calling and easy access to phone contacts via touch screen or commander as well as auto creation of voice tags
Mazda navigation system: European mapping with alternative route calculations, point of interest search and 3-years free map updates
Integrated Bluetooth®: Aha app and Stitcher app integration (Internet radio, Facebook, Twitter)
Mazda Multimedia System: AM/FM radio, single CD/MP3 with premium Bose® Centerpoint® surround-sound system and nine speakers
Integrated Bluetooth®: Audio transfer from compatible devices
Mazda Multimedia System: Multimedia Commander and volume control dial
Mazda Multimedia System: USB audio/iPod connectivity
Mazda Multimedia System: Steering wheel-mounted audio and Bluetooth® controls
Mazda Multimedia System: AM/FM radio, single CD/MP3 and six speakers
Mazda Multimedia System: Auxiliary (AUX) jack input, and two USB inputs
Mazda Multimedia System: 7" TFT colour touch-screen
Power steering: Electronic power assist system (EPAS)
Sun visors: Driver's and front passenger's, with covered mirror, illumination and ticket holder
Headlights: Halogen, with manual headlight levelling
Privacy glass: Rear and rear side windows
Door mirrors: Electrically-adjustable, power folding, heated body-coloured door mirrors with integrated indicators
Headlights: Bi-Xenon, with automatic headlight levelling and cleaning
Wipers: Front, adjustable speed with intermittent wipe
Wipers: Rear, adjustable speed with intermittent wipe
Headlights: LED signature daytime running lights
Parking distance sensors: Front and rear (with audible warning and visual display)
Parking distance sensors: Rear (with audible warning only)
Seats: Driver's seat, manual lumbar adjustment
Steering wheel: Telescopic and tilt adjustment
Seats: Driver's seat, manual slide, recline and height adjustment
Grab handles: Front passenger's and two rear with coat hooks
Steering wheel: Paddle shift for automatic transmission
Interior courtesy light, with integrated spotlight
Rear seats: Centre armrest with two cupholders
Storage spaces: Seatback pocket (front passenger seat)
Storage spaces: Door pockets (driver, front passenger and rear)
Seats: Driver's seat, power slide, recline and height adjustment
Seats: Heated front seats with 3-stage settings
Storage spaces: Inside front centre armrest
Meter set display: Active Driving Display (head-up display) - shows vehicle speed, warnings, and turn-by-turn navigation
Adjustable speed limiter: Vehicle speed can be limited to between 20-125mph, and speed cannot be exceeded without deactivating limiter
Secondary Collision Reduction (SCR): If vehicle is involved in an impact and airbags are deployed, SCR utilises the brakes and hazard warning lights to reduce the possibility of a secondary accident
Rear suspension: Multi-link suspension with twin-tube dampers
Self-supporting rigid and torsion-resistant all-steel body with defined crush zones for the front and rear sections, stable passenger safety cell with side impact reinforcement in the doors
Thatcham Category 1 alarm and immobiliser system
ISOFIX child seat anchorages: Attached to outer rear seats
Dynamic Stability Control (DSC) with Traction Control System (TCS)
SKYACTIV-Body engineered 'triple H' body structure to help protect occupants from impact forces
Seatbelts: Reminder (driver, passenger and rear seats), audible warning
Seatbelts: Front, 3-point (ELR) x 2 with pre-tensioners and load-limiters, height-adjustable
